file_content.text: All Brrik family being gone--all excepting Hare'en.
Sand Demon being dead... Shock Drum being off... this being great day!
"Boom-boom" finally stopped. Old Jedi looking bad.
All Brrik's family being dead. Brrik losing everything....
Sand Demon being dead? Good! Now turning off "boom-boom"!
Brrik's family risk everything. You not letting us down, yes?
You destroying Sand Demon, then stopping Shock Drum. You hurrying!
"Boom-boom" making big hole in planet--and Brrik finding more problems!
Sand Demon being here! Destroying all Brrik's droids!
I can't sense Master Kiwiiks at all anymore.
T7 circuits = sustaining damage from Shock Drum // Jedi + T7 = deactivate it fast
Sand Demon blocking way to Shock Drum. What Brrik and you doing about it?
I'll handle that beast, my friend. Keep your family safe.
You stay right here.
Brrik having big relief. Brrik happier standing guard.
Do whatever you want, but stay out from underfoot.
Keep out of my way.
You wanting Sand Demon all for yourself? Brrik happy staying here.
You and your people get the beast's attention. I'll come in behind you and surprise it.
Create a distraction for me.
That sounds like a great way to get these Jawas killed.
T7 estimates .00031 percent chance all Jawas survive // Jedi = sure about this plan?
Brrik hating to argue, but Brrik not wanting being dead. You having backup plan?
If you're not going to help, just keep out of my way.
Fine, you can stay here.
Brrik liking this plan better already.
After Sand Demon being dead, we helping stop "boom-boom." If you being dead instead... then we all being dead.
You fighting brave!
Think of all the salvage down here. It could all be yours.
Don't you want a reward?
Salvage? Why you not saying sooner? Of course, we helping!
Don't make me angry. That Sand Demon is nothing compared to me.
You'll help me or else.
Uhh... Brrik agreeing?
Brrik's family being in big trouble if you not coming, though. Do not being late!
Family! We all facing Sand Demon together!
"Boom-boom" in Sand Demon's lair. Bad news. Brrik preparing to die with planet.
Hare'en finding "boom-boom." Then you destroying it!
Brrik fixing droids! More droids being better security!
You are defeating Sand People! Good!
Brrik repairing droids. No time for talking.
